3: יֵ֣צֶר <sup>3336 </sup> <n>[whose] mind</n> סָמ֔וּךְ <sup>5564 </sup> <n>[is] stayed</n> תִּצֹּ֖ר <sup>5341 </sup> <n>Thou wilt keep</n> שָׁל֣וֹם ׀ <sup>7965 </sup> <n>[him] in perfect</n> שָׁל֑וֹם <sup>7965 </sup> <n>peace</n> כִּ֥י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>Because</n> בְךָ֖ בָּטֽוּחַ׃ <sup>982 </sup> <n>[on thee] because he trusteth</n>

5: כִּ֤י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> הֵשַׁח֙ <sup>7817 </sup> <n>For he bringeth down</n> יֹשְׁבֵ֣י <sup>3427 </sup> <n>them that dwell</n> מָר֔וֹם <sup>4791 </sup> <n>on high</n> קִרְיָ֖ה <sup>7151 </sup> <n>city</n> נִשְׂגָּבָ֑ה <sup>7682 </sup> <n>the lofty</n> יַשְׁפִּילֶ֤נָּה <sup>8213 </sup> <n>he layeth it low</n> יַשְׁפִּילָהּ֙ <sup>8213 </sup> <n>he layeth it low</n> עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>against</n> אֶ֔רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>[even] to the ground</n> יַגִּיעֶ֖נָּה <sup>5060 </sup> <n>he bringeth</n> עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>against</n> עָפָֽר׃ <sup>6083 </sup> <n>it [even] to the dust</n>
